resources.string: Translator bar has been minimized for this channel.
Translator bar has been minimized for this group.
Translator bar has been minimized for this chat.
This voice message is too long.
The searched option (%s) was moved to a different category (%s).
Customize the integrated message translation experience
You can customize the integrated message translation experience in OctoGram settings.
This feature is not available with the selected provider because you do not have a Telegram Premium subscription.

If enabled, the app follows Telegram\'s default translation. Telegram developers can choose to use ChatGPT, Google Translate as appropriate and this choice is in no way dependent on OctoGram. It\'s the default option and is recommended for most users.
Recommended if the account has a Telegram Premium subscription.
It\'s the fastest provider but may resort to translation errors.
It\'s very accurate but not recommended because of high limits.
It\'s very limited, but more reliable for some languages.
It doesn\'t support the language currently set.
The currently set language (%s) is not supported by the selected provider.
The translation target language of some chats has been changed because the previously set language is not supported by the selected provider.
%1$d% of page hasn\'t been translated due to an internal error. Please try again later.
Access the Google Cloud Console through this link: console.cloud.google.com.
If you do not have it, click on the "Enable" button.
Go to "Credentials" page, copy the API Key you generated and go to the next step.
To enable local translation on the device, an extension must be installed. Follow the next steps to proceed.
Open our channel from the link below and download the highlighted APK.
Install the APK as if it were a regular app. When finished, close the installer.
Enable device translation to verify that everything was successful.
You can choose to show the button to translate an entire chat.
An error occurred with the extension. Please, try again later.
If you want to free up additional space and no longer want to use the translation on the device, you can uninstall the extension from the settings.
Selected language isn\'t supported by the selected provider.
Entire chats translation will be optimized to be faster and send more messages at once, but it may not work correctly in some cases.
%2$s language model is needed for local translation
%2$s language models are needed for local translation
Downloading of some necessary language models is in progress. Please wait…
The translation of the article is in progress and may take a few seconds...
AI features have been successfully enabled.
All AI features will be hidden from the interface until reactivated. Are you sure you want to proceed?
You can integrate more features through AI to have a more true-to-life result.
You can integrate more features through AI.
By proceeding, you affirm that you have read the AI category on the Privacy Policy page.
At least one provider must be enabled to use AI features.
You can add multiple providers and choose the one you prefer individually when using an AI feature.
Use of %s is allowed only through an API Key, which you can generate by following the steps given here.
Access the Google AI Studio Console through this link: aistudio.google.com.
If you do not have it, click on the "Generate New Key" button.
Access the OpenAI Console through this link: platform.openai.com.
If you do not have it, click on the "Create new secret key" button.
Access the OpenRouter Console through this link: openrouter.ai.
If you do not have it, click on the "Create Key" button.
Copy the API Key you generated and go to the next step.
Past the copied API Key in the box below.
Manage the configuration of %s according to your parameters.
The use of %s API is not recommended as:
Media loading isn\'t supported with %s due to a technical limitation.
The number of requests available for %s is very limited compared to Gemini.
%s has no free uses and any use is subject to a fee.
The indicated API key doesn\'t seem to work. Do you want to save it anyway?
A server error occurred. Do you want to save the API key anyway?
You can configure more AI providers **here**.
AI-generated message transcriptions will fully replace Telegram’s standard transcription.
AI-generated message transcriptions will be shown separately from Telegram’s standard transcription.
At least one feature must be enabled to use AI features.
Can you sum up the content?
Can you recap what it says?
Just a sec, the spell is being cast…
Abracadabra… your content is coming to life!
AI wizards at work… the magic is brewing!
Something magical is loading… get ready!
The model is overloaded, please try again later
Media uploading is only supported by Gemini.
This file contains my custom model of OctoGram. Press here to import my own configuration.
Are you sure you want to delete the model?
Describe what the model should perform. If possible, specify as many details as possible using English language.
You are importing a model created by a third party user. Check the reliability of the prompt before saving it.
When executed on a media message, the content is automatically uploaded and passed to the AI for processing.
You can tap on a tag to quickly enter it into the prompt.
These tags are interactive and allow a choice to the user in generating the prompt.
This action will appear in the message context menu.
This action will appear in the input box before sending any message.
You can perform this action in chats by passing a specified number of messages to the AI.

Chat-related models will send the content of the last %d messages of the chat directly to the AI, which will be added as a list at the end of the prompt.\n\nYou can find the models in the context menu of each chat.
Enable option if this custom models refers to messages and not chat.
You have edited this model. Apply changes?
A similar model was found among those already saved. Are you sure you want to import this model?
You can speed up your workflow with custom AI prompts. Check out examples at %s.
AI functions make your life easier with tons of ready-to-use prompts. Here’s a quick look at what you get out of the box:
Before using AI features, you need to set up a provider, which is the service that will provide the answers. Pick the one you like — we recommend Gemini.
Enter below the name you want to associate with this device. You can also choose to use the default name.
You can choose to synchronize OctoGram\'s power-saving mode with your device\'s power-saving mode.
You are using the latest version available.
A new app update is available.
Please wait for the download to finish.
An error occurred while checking for updates.
If enabled, server will notify the app when to check for new updates.
An OctoGram update uses approximately 80 MB. Additional costs may be charged by your phone company.

Your main account is part of OctoGram\'s private beta program.\n\nBy activating this option, you can receive updates from the private beta program directly via OTA like other stable and beta updates, but some updates settings (like "%s") will be forcibly activated.
Please note that the update you are installing is part of the private beta program you joined and may have instabilities. If so, please report it in our official internal testing group.
You can close this popup during the download.
Install the update by pressing the above button.
A new update for your extension is available. Click below to go to the file.
This extension update will no longer be suggested here.
We\'re going to update the app to the latest version. Please wait a moment.
It appears that the automatic installation failed. Please press the button below to try again manually.
It appears that the automatic installation has been blocked by the system. Please press the button below to try again manually.
It appears that the new version is not compatible with your device. Please press the button below to try again manually.
It appears that a more recent version of the app is installed on your device. Please press the button below to try again manually.
It appears that there is insufficient space on your device for installation. Please press the button below to try again manually.
This affects emoji appearance only for you. Others see them based on their preferences.
Import and choose emoji sets from your internal storage.
%1$s is no longer in your emoji sets.
Are you sure you want to delete the selected emoji sets?
File must be an emoji font file.
Use system\'s emoji instead of the chosen ones
Welcome to the OctoGram Settings! Here you can customize your experience with the app
Discover more on the OctoGram world
You can contribute to development by requesting access to our internal testing group! You will have access to all features in preview.
Thank you for being part of our private beta group! You already have access to all features in preview.
Here you can customize some privacy settings related to the app
Hide your phone number in the app interfaces
Hide other people\'s phone number from their profile
Show a fake phone number in your profile, like %s.
Show your username as your phone number in your profile.
Here you can customize your general experience with the app
It introduces a "-" sign for groups and prepends "-100" for supergroups, broadcast groups, and channels.
It shows IDs directly as they are provided by Telegram.
Show user\'s registration date in profiles. Note that this is achieved through guessing, so it may show inaccurate results
Allows to swipe up from a channel / topic to jump to next one
Swipe up on a video to enter Picture-in-Picture mode.
Hides the greeting sticker when messaging a new contact
Shows the online status of other people next to their profile picture in groups
Enable smart notifications for private chats
Pull down to Open the Archive
Automatically opens the archive when pulling down
Here you can customize your chats experience with the app
Lock chats using the three-dot menu in-chat or in the chat list to view them here. **Tap to config >**
You can lock chats using the three-dot menu in-chat, in the chat list, or by pressing the button below. To view locked chats, long press on the action bar in the dialogs page.
You can choose to hide or show each chat individually.
Only you can view the content of these chats by unlocking it with your fingerprint or face.
Hidden chats will be displayed normally on other devices.
Here you can customize locked chats options
Hide locked chats from the list
Locked chats notifications will be visible but the message content will be censored.
Biometric authentication will only be required once every %1$s.
Check device\'s fingerprint settings before editing options.
No fingerprint has been detected in your Android settings. If fingerprint authentication is already enabled, try pressing the "Test Fingerprint" button to resolve the issue.
Many options have been hidden because they aren\'t compatible with your device.
Try to reboot your device or check system settings.
You can access hidden chats by long pressing on your profile in the drawer.

All your accounts can now be secured effortlessly with your fingerprint — fast, safe, and seamless. Double Bottom is now Locked Accounts, integrated into the all-new privacy settings. Tap below to learn more!
Unlock your account with biometrics or switch to a different account.
Logging out of the account is the only way if you can\'t remember the password.
Make telegram your own by customizing the settings below
This will replace the text "Edited" with a pencil icon
Choose whether to show share button for media and channel posts
Enter here the custom title that will appear in the header bar instead of \"%s\".
You won\'t see stories in the main header, but you can still find them on a user\'s profile.
The downloads icon will always be shown in the header, even when there are no active items.
Force pacman animation when archiving a chat
Some header-related options have been hidden because they are automatically handled by the centered title option.
The options will be shown in the 3 dots menu at the top right of the chat.
The options will be shown in full at the top of the profiles.
With this position, it is recommended to show only the options really needed given the limited space available.
The options will be shown in the 3 dots menu at the top right of the profile.
You can reply to messages by dragging them from right to left.
Some OctoGram options may not be visible in this view.
Customize the appearance of the app
Customize the appearance of the drawer
Selected emojis will be shown for premium accounts.
Since the Settings element is hidden by the drawer elements, the preferred option must necessarily be the settings one.
It will apply a modern touch to the drawer by showing the profile as bubble.
Show user icons in chats list
Show user icons in chats list near sender name in groups.
Use Material You\'s dynamic icon on Android 12
You were chuped! Chupa\'s icon is now available in settings.
You have unlocked the shy fox icon! Activate it from settings.
Hehe, you found me~. Go to the settings and change the icon!
You have unlocked confetti! Activate the new secret icon from settings.
Try out new and shiny features
These features are experimental and may not work as expected. You may experience crashes and other issues. Please report any issues you encounter to the developers
You have changed some navigation settings. Do you want to apply the changes?
Click anywhere in the preview to open a new page and check the smoothness
Try scrolling using gestures to try the animated action bar
Use a different navigation style when navigating through the app
Choose the fluidity of individual screens in the app
Make the action bar transition animation more linear
It automatically selects the highest quality when you watch a video or story.
It automatically selects the lowest quality when you watch a video or story.
It will use the lower quality only if you are not using Wi-Fi.
The interface will be forcibly adapted to a smartphone.
The interface will be forcibly adapted to a tablet.

This option is, by default, disabled on the official Telegram clients and therefore in private chats all notifications were sent with sound or vibration.\n\nBy enabling it, the behavior of notifications will vary in all chats: as well as in groups, all private chats will default to 2 notifications every 3 minutes.
You can manage this option from OctoGram settings.
More beveled edges and more space to display popup content.
OctoGram will use the default Telegram icons without any changes.
OctoGram will use the Solar Icons created by %s (%s).
OctoGram will use the Material Design 3 Icons created by Google (more details %s).
Random icons will be used to create the “Meme” effect. The interface may have errors and inconsistencies. This feature is available just in the BETA version of OctoGram!
This account doesn\'t support story publishing.
One of your accounts doesn\'t support publishing stories. This option may not be working properly.
Are you sure you want to send this sticker?
Are you sure you want to send this GIF?
Hide open button in chats list
The selected operation is not available because the in-app browser has been disabled.
Enter a domain for which confirmation will not be asked before opening.
Telegram will always open links from these websites without asking for confirmation.
Are you sure you want to hide this folder? You can show it from settings.
By continuing,\nyou agree to the *Privacy Policy*.
You can select up to 25 emojis.
You can hide the list of recent emoji and show only the pinned ones by activating this option.
You can pin emojis from any pack.
You can pin reactions from any pack.
You can pin just default reactions.
You can select up to 5 reactions.
You can select up to 10 hashtags.
You can pin any hashtag you want to find it easily.
To pin a new hashtag, write the name and press enter on the keyboard.
You have changed the list of hashtags. Apply changes?
Tap an item on this page to share the direct link
You can report any crashes you encounter here in our official group: %s.
Do you want to delete %s crash logs? This action is irreversible
Do you want to delete %s debug logs? This action is irreversible
Octogram recently crashed unexpectedly. You can share the crash log with our developers by pressing the button below.
Click to open crash history page
There was an error while sending crash logs
Use the button below to share the latest crash log.\nIt is recommended that you only share the file in official OctoGram chats.
Use the button below to share the selected crash log.\nIt is recommended that you only share the file in official OctoGram chats.
This account will connect to the test backend.
This account will connect to the production backend.
**%s** and you have added each other in the contacts list.
Choose a custom name for the file or press share directly to send it to a trusted chat.
What do you want to save?
This file contains all the settings of OctoGram. Press here to set up my own configuration.
Export file has been sent successfully.
The specified file name cannot be used. Try another name.
An OctoGram configuration was detected in this file. Keep in mind that this will overwrite your settings. Do you want to proceed with the import?
This file, sent by an external user, contains a configuration of OctoGram and may activate unwanted experimental options. Are you sure you want to apply it?

This option contains some privacy and security settings regarding your app.

Some parts, such as saved messages, may be restricted by fingerprint authentication.

Do you want to import them?
%d options have been imported successfully. Restart the app to complete the transfer.
You must select at least one option in order to proceed with the import.
The file you selected isn\'t an OctoGram backup.
File must be an export file.

Are you really sure you want to reset all OctoGram settings? Any options applied will not be retained after restart.\n\nKeep in mind that before resetting, you may want to make a backup so that you can recover these settings in the future.
Are you really sure you want to reset all the Experimental OctoGram settings? Any options applied will not be retained after restart.
An error occurred during backup generation and the settings were not reset.
You will lose access to all your Saved Messages as well as all messages, media and files from your chats.
The groups and channels you created will either get new admins or become orphaned.
More than %d channels and groups will be deleted

Your chat partners will keep their message history with you, including the messages you shared in Secret Chats.\n\nYou can remove any messages for both sides at any time, but this will not be possible if you delete your account.
More than %d chats with other users will be deleted
Wait, let\'s talk seriously. This is the last popup that appears. Once you confirm this, you will no longer be able to do anything. Are you sure you want to continue?
In order to verify your identity, you need to set up two-factor authentication.
Are you sure you want to delete the chat history for this user?
Are you sure you want to delete the chat history for %d users?
OctoGram Channel - News and tips for your client
Oh, I love OctoGram 🐙! I just learned today that it\'s Italian, how cool!
In Italy, they say the pizza 🍕 is really good… When are we going?
I love the new OctoGram update!
Cool! I\'m going to try it out now!
Check the Telegram\'s Datacenter Status in realtime.
Here you can test downloads from different datacenters.
Here you can test pings to different Telegram websites.
Tap here to see the reason
Telegram has imposed a limit on this download as too many requests have been made recently. Please wait a few minutes and try the ping again.
The test uses a %1$d MB file.
An error occurred during the download attempt. Please try again later.
An activity is running. Do you want to stop it?
It seems that your network connection isn\'t stable. Do you want to proceed anyway?
Downloads tests aren\'t available in test backends.
Please wait some seconds before restarting the activity.
By proceeding, you agree to the DC Status Terms of Service.
Customize the elements in the drawer
Customize side menu items to better meet your needs.
CameraX is only supported on selected devices, effects and lenses support depends on your manufacturer.
Access directly the system camera (not applicable for video messages).
Camera 2 API provides advanced camera features and better control over image capture. It is supported on most modern devices.
Start recording video messages with the rear camera instead of the front camera
Open the system camera directly in video recording mode
Choose the position of the camera button
Here you can customize your camera experience with the app
Use CameraX instead of the legacy API
Enable zero shutter lag for CameraX
Enable performance mode for CameraX. This will reduce the quality of the photos taken
CameraX\'s quality will be reduced in favor of performance
Since on Android 12 the monet icon was forced and you upgraded to Android 13, you need to change the app icon to the default one for a better support.
The indicator will be shown among other information in the style of OwlGram.
The indicator will be shown among other information in the style of Telegram.
The indicator will be shown in minimal style immediately below the user\'s status.
Hide the unread counter on the folder
Include muted chats in the unread message counter.
Show the unread message count instead of the unread chat count.
For Android 12 and newer, you need to manually add link to verified links in order to open t.me links in OctoGram.
You cannot add more than %s photos/video!
These models have been downloaded to your device for offline translation. You can remove them to free up space.
Are you sure you want to delete the translation model for **%1$s**? You\'ll need to download it again to translate to or from this language.
Could not delete the model. Please try again later.
You\'re using an outdated version of the OctoGram Extension – OnDevice. Please update to at least version **%1$s** (**%2$d**).
